data.title: IWM Fellow Tomasz Rakowski nominated for Jan Długosz Contest
data.meta_description: Congratulations to the professor for his nomination.
data.text:
Introducing Our First Fellows of the New Academic Year

We are excited to announce our first fellows of this new academic year. You can find out more about their individual fellowships and research projects by clicking on their names. For interview requests and other media-related inquiries,…

New Podcast Episode with Sławomir Sierakowski on Europe, China, and the Future of Global Politics

In this episode of the Vienna Coffee House Conversations, host Ivan Vejvoda is joined by Sławomir Sierakowski, a distinguished Polish sociologist, public intellectual, and founder of Kritika Polityczna.
